content:
That's awesome! Redeeming a surprise coupon is always a great feeling, especially when it's on something you need or regularly buy like coffee creamer! It's like finding money in your pocket that you didn't know you had.

It's also a great reminder to regularly check your email inbox for coupons and offers. Many retailers, like Target, send exclusive coupons and promotions to their email subscribers. By staying on top of your email, you can catch those surprise deals and save even more.

Here's a tip to help you stay organized:

**Designate an email folder:** Create a specific folder in your email inbox for coupons, offers, and promotions. This way, you can easily find and sort through them when you need to. You can also set up filters or labels to automatically sort these emails into your designated folder.

By doing this, you'll be more likely to catch those surprise coupons and make the most of your savings.

How often do you typically shop at Target, and what are some of your favorite items to buy there?
